name: Ality
slogan: Performance marketing, delivering campaigns that click, connect, and convert
description: We help clients utilise the power of digital. Our services include social media management, paid social, and pay per click advertising.

jobs.title: PPC Account Manager
jobs.description:
PPC Account Manager

Can you catch a fly with chopsticks? Do you know the power of wax on, wax off? If yes, then read on!

We are now looking for a pro-active, enthusiastic and personable individual to join our small but award-winning digital marketing agency in central London. Working with a client base spanning a broad range of B2B and B2C industries where you will assist in the creation of campaigns that click, connect and convert. We pride ourselves on performance, attention to detail and client satisfaction. You’ll need to have a willingness to ‘get stuck in’ and deliver amazing work.

As PPC Account Manager, you will:

- Have a proven track record in Paid Search management and be comfortable handling large and complex accounts.
- Develop initial keyword lists for internal and client review.
- Write initial draft creative based on briefing materials and best practice.
- Perform account diagnostics and report on the good, bad and ugly.
- Be knowledgeable of the latest updates regarding industry tools and user interfaces (Google Ads, Microsoft Ads, bid management and reporting platforms etc).
- Participate in weekly team meetings and offer ideas and suggestions to improve and evolve agency process.
- Demonstrate ability to lead meetings and strategy, take ownership of client success, managing their expectations, budgets and driving impact.
- Show appropriate time management skills to include completion of projects on time and be proactive in quieter periods.
- Develop knowledge of client businesses.
- Complete accurate forecasts and cost estimates for planning and be proficient in competitor research tools as well as Google Analytics.
- Provide new business support as needed.
- Train and develop junior team members as needed.
- Create and manage paid media campaigns across search and display networks, analyse and consistently test keyword and ad performance.
- Manage bids and budgets according to client KPIs, optimising across multiple channels to ensure maximum ROI.
- Communicate with clients by email, phone and in person on a daily, weekly and monthly basis as needed to ensure strong relationships.
- Produce detailed monthly reports using our proprietary analytics platform as well as the engine accounts.
- Support the Director in the new business pitch process.
- Keep up to date on all industry developments.

Essential skills required:

- An absolute minimum of 1 year of previous agency experience in a similar role.
- You will be fully Google Ads certified (fundamentals and other exams required).
- Highly numerate and fluent in Excel (including formulae and pivot tables).
- Good presentation and inter-personal skills, comfortable communicating with clients and stakeholders at all levels.
- Native English proficiency both written and spoken.
- Able to work independently.

Desirable skills:

- Familiarity and experience in Programmatic advertising would be hugely desirable.
- Familiarity and experience in Paid Social advertising would be equally beneficial.
- Fluency in Keynote and PowerPoint.
- Project management experience.
- Experience working with Wordpress and some basic coding knowledge.
- Second language would be a plus.

Why should you join us?

- We are a small team and offer a fun, friendly atmosphere and regular work socials.
- Flexible working hours and a 35-hour working week.
- 25 days of holiday + all bank holidays + extra time off over the Christmas break.
- A shiny MacBook and great tech.
- Discounted gym membership.
- A whole host of perks from discounts including cinema tickets to money off your favourite stores.
- The opportunity to learn a range of skills in different departments.
- Our fantastic High Holborn location.
- Plenty of opportunities for progression and to make an impact that simply isn't possible in large network agencies.
- And we are about to launch a super-duper new website/branding (keep a look out for this in the coming weeks).

We would prefer someone that can start within a month of receiving their offer. Please note that we may not be able to respond personally to all applicants but we thank everyone in advance for their interest!
